data.prayer: Father, help the 681,762 believers in Eastern to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,951,438 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Eastern, Ghana
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Eastern hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Eastern, Ghana that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Eastern, Ghana to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Mandingo, Mandinka people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, let those from the 681,762 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 681,762 believers in Eastern against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.section_summary:
the state of Eastern, Ghana has a population of 2,633,200.

We estimate Eastern has 681,762 people who might know Jesus, 961,315 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 990,123 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Eastern to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
